values:
Just thought I'd make a post before going off to bed.

Well my exams are over, so I don't fancy talking about them anymore (still lots of work to be done, put it that way). 

So I'm on DoA now which is good, some really nice people o there. And I've been told that its still cool for me to go to doll-meets even without a doll (OMG) so i would like to take part in that in the new year! So today when i should have been learning I ended up making part of Danyel's bed. XD

It's a big plastic tub and so far I've made the bed sheet with that scrunched hem that most bed sheets have. It still needs to be taken up a little bit, but its looking really good! Haven't sewn in ages so it was good practice. The good thing about the box itself is that everything can be stored inside it so it's really easy to transport. Though of course one day i would like to get a proper bed for Danyel!

Anyway, I'm feeling pretty tired so I'm gonna organise my folder for tomorrow, do a bit of reading for uni and hit the hay. 

Night!

Well, I was going to start writing about Danyel because I couldn't sleep but after trawling through the net, and making this funky default icon (I HEART IMAGEREADY) i now find that i am too tired to do so.

But atleast i worked on something Danyel themed! The icon is very much how Danyel will look in the early stages (that is the Normal Kiss model), but he'll have a slightly different black wig (like floor length, center parting, will have to cut some bangs in though :3).

I like this picture of the model because it really reminds me of Danyel, of how i envisioned him. He has this 'don't even think about it' kind of look on his face, almost as if he's pitying anyone who tries to hurt him, even though the slightest knock can hospitalise the poor lad. Lol, i should explain that at least- he was born with Brittle Bone Disease. Very fitting considering it all. But there is no false bravado. When he means buisness, he truly believes he's indestructable... but that's best left for explaining at another time!

EDIT: come to think of it, i may have to make more icons, since this one only took 5mins and i'm sure i could do alot better. It will keep me occupied while i pass the months anyway. I'm sure other people would want to use them too :>
